products.title: Men’s Northport™ Insulated Softshell Glove
products.description: Comfortable softshell gloves built to keep hands warm and protected in cold weather. Featuring a thermal-reflective lining, water-and-stain repellency, 40g insulation, and touch screen-compatible fingertips.

products.title: Men’s Thermarator™ Glove
products.description: Designed for an intuitive fit, these soft and comfortable gloves pack serious warmth in cold conditions. Featuring a thermal-reflective lining, 280g fleece insulation, elastic wrists, and fingertip touch screen compatibility.

products.title: Men’s Ascender™ Softshell Glove
products.description: Comfortable everyday softshell gloves designed to keep hands warm and protected in chilly weather. Featuring advanced water-and-stain repellency, silicone palm grip, and a touch screen-compatible fingertip.

products.title: Thick Wool Thermal Socks
products.description: HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS: 55% wool, 25% cotton, 15% polyester, 5% spandex. These wool socks are a blend of high cashmere and merino materials, super soft fuzzy inner and stylish outer design.

products.title: Men’s Northbounder™ Interchange Jacket
products.description: A versatile 3-in-one jacket with a waterproof-breathable outer shell and insulated inner layer you can wear separately or together for maximum warmth and protection.

products.title: Men’s Northbounder™ Down Parka
products.description: A versatile winter parka built for warmth and protection in chilly conditions. Featuring a waterproof-breathable shell, 450-fill power down insulation, just-right stretch, zippered hand pockets, and adjustable hood, cuffs, and hem.

products.title: Men’s Norwester™ Anorak II
products.description: Unique style meets winter warmth with a water-resistant shell, thermal-reflective lining, synthetic down insulation, side entry zip, zippered waist pocket, elastic cuffs, and adjustable hood and hem.

products.title: Men’s Lone Fir 650 TurboDown™ Hooded Jacket
products.description: The mountains are calling—answer them in this water-resistant hooded puffy made to withstand winter’s worst.

products.title: Men’s Ramble™ Down Hybrid Hooded Jacket
products.description: This performance hybrid jacket is built for active days in the cold. It's water-and-wind-resistant, with an adjustable hem to seal in the heat.

products.title: Men’s Pike Lake™ Jacket
products.description: Wide baffles packed with synthetic insulation and thermal-reflective lining make this jacket your go-to when temperatures drop.

products.title: Men’s Gate Racer™ Softshell Jacket
products.description: Layer up comfortably with this stretchy, water-repellant, hooded softshell lined with cozy fleece and that's both breathable and built for mobility.

products.title: Leather Belt
products.description: Silver-tone square buckle, Prong closure, 7 holes for adjustable sizing.

products.title: Men's Outdoor Casual Stand Collar Padded Vest Coats
products.description: Nice looking warm vest is ideal to pair with tee shirts, heavy coats, jeans, sport pants, boots, or other casual wear for spring, fall or winter season.

products.title: Men’s Loma Vista™ Hooded Jacket
products.description: This fleece-lined jacket is made of a cotton-blend, water-resistant canvas with an internal ribbed collar for protection from the wind.

products.title: Men’s South Canyon™ Long Jacket
products.description: Easy-going and durable, this jacket is waterproof-breathable and fully seam-sealed with a flannel lining for extra warmth.

products.title: Garment-Dyed Crewneck Sweater
products.description: The perfect layer piece. This crewneck sweaters is crafted from 4-ply superfine cotton. Lightweight micro pique. 16-gage. Garment-dyed for sun washed aesthetic.
